name: fastrecover
effects: Reduces healing delay from 5 seconds to 3.3 seconds, Increases healing power from 20 per tick to 27 per tick but healing rate remains at 1 tick / second.

name: persistence
effects: Scorestreak progression no longer resets upon being killed. Applies to each scorestreak once per match.

name: flakjacket
effects: Reduce explosion and continous damage received by 35%.

name: skulker
effects: Increase walking and strafing speed by 12%.

name: agile
effects: Currently bugged so the advantage is insignificant, Previously, it reduces ADS time after sprinting by ?%. Reduce object vaulting time by ?%.

name: lightweight
effects: Increase sprinting speed by 5%. Nullify fall damage.

name: restock
effects: Replenishes all equipment every 25 seconds after use.

name: tactician
effects: Spawn with 1 extra piece of tactical equipment.

name: overclock
effects: Increases the charging speed of the Operator Skill.

name: martydom
effects: Drops a live Frag Grenade upon death.

name: ironlungs
effects: Increases the breath hold time while using a sniper rifle.

name: vulture
effects: Collect ammo equivalent to one magazine of weapon in hand from enemies killed.

name: toughness
effects: Reduce hit flinch by 60%.

name: tracker
effects: Reveal enemy footsteps within the recent 4 seconds on the ground in bright red marks.

name: ghost
effects: Completely invisible against Enemy UAVs, Advance UAVs will not reveal direction, Unmarked on enemy VTOLs & Predator Missile, Will not alert enemies using Hight Alert.

name: coldblooded
effects: Grant invisibility towards AI operated enemy scorestreaks.

name: hardwired
effects: Does not trigger enemy tripmines, Provides immunity against enemy Counter UAVs and EMP effects. Reduce footstep mark duration for enemy Tracker users.

name: quickfix
effects: Weapon kills and objective captures instantly activate health regeneration. Does not effect regeneration rate

name: amped
effects:
Reduce drop and raise time of all weapons and equipment. (Weapon drop 250ms, raise 350ms).
Increased throwing spped of lethal and tactical equipment
Faster reload speed for launchers.

name: recon
effects: After killing enemy, nearby enemies will be scanned & displayed on the minimap.

name: gungho
effects: Allows sprinting while Hip Firing, Reloading & using Utilites.

name: hardline
effects: Increase all score income earned from kills by 25%.

name: demoexpert
effects: Increase all explosive damage dealt by 25%.

name: tacticalmask
effects: Reduce the duration of tactical equipment effects by 40%.

name: alert
effects: Amplify enemy footstep audio. Enemies moving within 3m radius will be shown with general direction on minimap.

name: engineer
effects: Reveals enemy equipment and scorestreaks. Grant ability to re-roll and sabotage care packages.

name: deadsilence
effects: Provide silent movement when walking, crouching, strafing & proning. Reduce footstep audio towards Alert users by 50%.

name: shrapnel
effects: Spawn with 1 extra piece of lethal equipment. Explosive damage delays enemy health regeneration.

name: highalert
effects: Screen will flash bright orange if spotted by enemies outside of your FOV. Grant ability to ping and reveal enemy positions in direct lines of sight by ADSing and aiming in their general direction.

name: launcherplus
effects: Spawn with 1 extra round of reserve ammo for equipped launchers.
